data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lamelas-López, Lucas, Raposeiro, Pedro Miguel, Borges, Paulo A. V., Florencio, Margarita (2017): Annotated checklist of aquatic beetles (Coleoptera) and true bugs (Heteroptera) in the Azores Islands: new records and corrections of colonization status. Zootaxa 4353 (1): 117-132, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4353.1.7|20 occurrences
